product_details.description: Welcome to the standard in gaming chairs – the RESPAWN 110 Gaming Chair. This isn't just a chair; it's your ticket to comfort paradise, where every gaming session feels like a luxurious adventure. Get ready to embark on a journey of ergonomic bliss and immersive gameplay like never before! But the RESPAWN 110 is more than just a comfortable seat – it's a companion on your gaming adventures. With its adjustable 135 degree reclining back and tilting seat, it caters to your every need, ensuring you stay focused and energized for hours on end. Say goodbye to stiff backs and sore muscles – we have your back, literally! And let's talk style – because this chair is not just about function, it's about making a statement. With its sleek design, vibrant color options, and eye-catching accents, it adds flair to any gaming setup. Whether you're streaming for your fans or competing in tournaments, RESPAWN 110 ensures you do it in style. From its sturdy steel tube frame construction with a 275lb weight capacity to its luxurious comfort, it's no wonder why players everywhere are singing its praises. Join the ranks of elite gamers who demand the best and experience the difference for yourself. So why settle for an ordinary chair when you can level up your gaming experience with the RESPAWN 110 Gaming Chair? Rest comfortably, and assured, because the chair is covered by the RESPAWN 5-Year Limited Warranty and say goodbye to discomfort and hello to gaming nirvana – your quest for the perfect chair ends here! Fabric, Metal Frame, Plywood, Epe, Foam Upgraded Design: The sleeker look of the updated 110 still provides the comfort personality and support needed for gaming sessions while remaining professional enough for your streams or team meetings. Integrated Lumbar Support: The high back headrest and built-in lumbar support ensure ergonomic gaming chair to always have your back. Height adjustability for a perfect fit to your PC Computer Desk at home or in the office. Premium Experience: PC chair with sturdy steel frame construction will support gamers of all sizes and ensure longevity. The smooth rolling casters offers enhanced mobility while deep in the trenches of video gaming or around your desk space. Recline and Relax: Enjoy up to 135 Degree Reclining and Tilt Lock. Simply adjust the tilt tension knob to your desired position for the utmost comfort during work or play. Durable Office Furniture: This heavy-duty chair supports up to 275 lbs weight capacity for long-lasting use. Brand - RESPAWN ** Color - Blue ** Product Dimensions - 21.3"D x 28.1"W x 54.5"H ** Size - High Back ** Back Style - Solid Back **

banner_details:
This banner features a modern and bold layout centered around promoting a premium ergonomic gaming chair. The dark background sets a sleek, high-tech tone, accented by layered abstract wave shapes at the bottom in various deep shades of blue. The top section of the banner contains three stacked, attention-grabbing header text layers: `heading_1` in bright white, `heading_2` in a strong royal blue, and `description` in a lighter bluish-purple hue for contrast and clarity.

In the center, the `product_image` prominently showcases the gaming chair, enhancing product visibility. The price (`price`) is displayed in large, bold white font near the bottom, directly above a blue `cta_button` with a concise call-to-action labeled by `cta`. Subtle geometric decorations and thin line details in shades of blue add depth without distracting from the core message.

**Color Palette:**
- Jet Black Background: `#121212`
- Deep Blue: `#1a237e`
- Indigo: `#303f9f`
- Royal Blue: `#3949ab`
- Pale Indigo: `#8c9eff`
- White: `#ffffff`
product_color: The product image features a sleek gaming chair with a dominant black base that provides a premium and professional look. Vivid royal blue accents highlight the edges, stitching, and brand logo, adding a modern and energetic tone without overwhelming the minimalistic aesthetic. The matte black (#1B1B1B) defines the chair's core structure, while electric blue (#0056B8) emphasizes key design areas, creating a striking contrast. Hints of gray (#A0A0A0) appear in the metallic support frame for balance. The colors are well-blended with defined boundaries, enhancing the chair’s ergonomic curves. For an advertisement banner, this palette exudes precision, strength, and performance.
